price: E soprar-se-á na Trombeta: então, ei-los que, das tumbas, sairão açodados para junto de seu Senhor.
arabic: وَنُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَإِذَا هُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَجۡدَاثِ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡ يَنسِلُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wanufikha fī al-ṣūri fa-idhā hum mina al-ajdāthi ilā rabbihim yansilūna
